<cs> my lords i do not think that i am any more qualified to follow the general tenor of this debate into the wider fields of the moral and social problems arising from the abuse of alcohol than i am to follow the noble lord lord porritt into the medical field <e> <s> as a matter of fact i could wish that i had been able to speak before him because what i am about to say might have induced him to say something more but no doubt he will do so on another occasion <e>
